short_summary: Replacement of septic tanks in Rouge National Urban Park.
description: This is a formal request for proposal for an experienced licensed Sewage System Installer to replace septic systems in refurbished places, specifically at (1) 4715 York Durham Line, Pickering ON L1Y 1A3 (4715 YDL), (2) 9992 York Durham Line, Markham ON L6B 1A8 (9992 YDL), (3) 5090 Sideline 30, Pickering ON L1Y 0A4 (5090 Sideline 30) and (4) 8 Beare Rd, Scarborough, ON M1X 1P6 (8 Beare Rd.).
duration_in_months: } ONLY ONE QUANTITY SPECIFIED: THE REPLACEMENT FOR FOUR LOCATIONS
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Details
**Project Title**: Stage 1 - Septic Tank Replacement, Rouge National Urban Park
**Reference Number**: CB-447-64808971
**Publication Date**: November 29, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: December 14, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)

## Procurement Details
**Procurement Category**: CNST
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
**Solicitation Number**: 5P468-23-0217/A
**Contracting Entity**: Parks Canada Agency
**Contact Information**: Cloë Pelland Tessier, cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca, (418) 928-7252

## Project Description
Parks Canada is seeking a licensed Sewage System Installer to replace septic systems at four locations in Ontario. The project is valued between $250,001 and $500,000, inclusive of taxes. The successful bidder will be required to provide documentation for bonding and insurance purposes.

## Tender Instructions
This is a two-stage selection process. Interested suppliers must submit their qualifications in Stage 1, and only pre-qualified suppliers will be invited to submit a financial bid in Stage 2. The pre-qualification list will expire within 180 days or upon award of a contract in Stage 2, whichever is earlier.

## Tender Requirements
The successful bidder will be required to provide the following:
* Replace septic systems at four locations in Ontario
* Provide documentation for bonding and insurance purposes
* Comply with National Parks Regulations and relevant laws, rules, and regulations

## Contact Information
For any technical or contractual inquiries, please contact Cloë Pelland Tessier at cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca or (418) 928-7252.

## Document Availability
All tender documents, including the solicitation document and any addenda, are available on the Government of Canada's tender portal at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

Note: Late submissions will not be considered. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring their submissions are received on time and in accordance with the tender instructions.  ENDS.
